availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: At a court called and held for Hart County On Saturday May the 7. 1864

Present Hon Wm Gardner Judge It is ordered that Ben F. Jameson be and he is hereby appointed Sheriff of Hart County to fill the vacancy occasioned by the resignation of Wm B. Craddock Whereupon I the said Jameson took the Oaths prescribed by the constitution and Laws of Kentucky And he together With Alex McHatton A. G. Kissiner, C. T. Wright Wm M. Wright D.C. Doran W. T. Spurling Obediah Hodges Thomas ^his X mark^ Hodges

S. J. J. Lee J. G. Simpson J Chase K Jameson George Highbaugh W. B. Hankla & Wm A Whitman his sureties entered into & acknowledged Covenant to the Commonwealth of Kentucky conditional accordent to Law, which was approved By the court

Copy Teste
H. M. Shuffett Clk

Hart Co
Sheriff
apptd &
Comd
9th May 1864
